00025 //
00026 // Module Manager
00027 //
00028 // wxPluginManager would be MUCH better, but it's an "undocumented" framework.
00029 //
00030 #define ModuleDispatchName "ModuleDispatch"
00031 
00032 typedef enum
00033 {
00034    ModuleInitialize,
00035    ModuleTerminate,
00036    AppInitialized,
00037    AppQuiting,
00038    ProjectInitialized,
00039    ProjectClosing,
00040    MenusRebuilt
00041 } ModuleDispatchTypes;
00042 
00043 typedef int (*fnModuleDispatch)(ModuleDispatchTypes type);
00044 
00045 class Module
00046 {
00047 public:
00048    Module(const wxString & name);
00049    virtual ~Module();
00050 
00051    bool Load();
00052    void Unload();
00053    int Dispatch(ModuleDispatchTypes type);
00054 
00055 private:
00056    wxString mName;
00057    wxDynamicLibrary *mLib;
00058    fnModuleDispatch mDispatch;
00059 };
00060 
00061 class ModuleManager:public wxModule
00062 {
00063 public:
00064    ModuleManager() {};
00065    virtual ~ModuleManager() {};
00066 
00067    virtual bool OnInit();

00072
